sentences.en: A man in a crash helmet was mounting a motorbike.
sentences.cn: 一位戴头盔的男子正跨上摩托车。

sentences.en: Ben drove off on his motorbike.
He crashed my motorbike last year and now I've crashed his car, so we're quits.
sentences.cn: 去年他把我的摩托车给撞了,现在我把他的汽车给撞了.这就算扯平了吧.

sentences.en: He drove his motorbike, with me riding pillion.
sentences.cn: 他开摩托车, 我坐在后座上.

sentences.en: He suffered severe brain damage after a motorbike accident.
sentences.cn: 在遭遇一次摩托车事故后，他的脑部严重受损。

sentences.en: I don't ride my motorbike much anymore.
sentences.cn: 我不怎么骑我的摩托车了。

sentences.en: I want to go by motorbike.
Joe had a close call when his motorbike nearly collided with a lorry.
sentences.cn: 乔的摩托车差点同卡车相撞,他侥幸地躲过了.

sentences.en: No, you can't have a motorbike. Whoever put that idea into your head?
sentences.cn: 不, 你不能买摩托车. 到底是谁使你有那个奢望的?

sentences.en: Richardson severed his right foot in a motorbike accident.
sentences.cn: 理查森在一次摩托车事故中失去了他的右脚。

sentences.en: Some earlier witness reports cited by police or security officials had explosives being thrown from a motorbike or the upper storey's of an adjacent hotel.
sentences.cn: 一些更早的证词报道引用警方或安全部门的话说，爆炸物从摩托车上扔下，或是从领进旅馆的楼上扔下来。

sentences.en: The motorbike is supposed to make annoying noise.
sentences.cn: 摩托车当然会发出令人感到烦恼的噪音。

sentences.en: Tom's new motorbike goes like blazes.
sentences.cn: 汤姆的新摩托车疾驶如飞.

sentences.en: When she said she wanted to get a motorbike, her parents threw up their hands in horror.
sentences.cn: 她说想要辆摩托车时, 她父母吓了一大跳.

trans.tran_en: a small fast two-wheeled vehicle with an engine
